    <td style="padding-right: 5.4pt; padding-left: 5.4pt; text-align: center"><span id="xdx_90B_edei--Security12bTitle_c20220216__20220216__us-gaap--StatementClassOfStockAxis__custom--Sec1.625NotesDue2035Member_z3Rm8iqe0vRc"><ix:nonNumeric contextRef="From2022-02-162022-02-16_custom_Sec1.625NotesDue2035Member" name="dei:Security12bTitle">1.625% Notes Due 2035</ix:nonNumeric></span></td>

    <td style="padding-right: 5.4pt; padding-left: 5.4pt; text-align: center"><span id="xdx_90D_edei--SecurityExchangeName_c20220216__20220216__us-gaap--StatementClassOfStockAxis__custom--Sec0.950NotesDue2036Member_z9hfRnxhtLwk"><ix:nonNumeric contextRef="From2022-02-162022-02-16_custom_Sec0.950NotesDue2036Member" format="ixt-sec:exchnameen" name="dei:SecurityExchangeName">New York Stock Exchange</ix:nonNumeric></span></td></tr>
  <tr style="vertical-align: top">
    <td style="padding-right: 5.4pt; padding-left: 5.4pt; text-align: center"><span id="xdx_90C_edei--Security12bTitle_c20220216__20220216__us-gaap--StatementClassOfStockAxis__custom--Sec0.800NotesDue2040Member_zY0QioUJjxQ4"><ix:nonNumeric contextRef="From2022-02-162022-02-16_custom_Sec0.800NotesDue2040Member" name="dei:Security12bTitle">0.800% Notes Due 2040</ix:nonNumeric></span></td>
    <td style="padding-right: 5.4pt; padding-left: 5.4pt; text-align: center"><span id="xdx_905_edei--TradingSymbol_c20220216__20220216__us-gaap--StatementClassOfStockAxis__custom--Sec0.800NotesDue2040Member_zullIphv4rHf"><ix:nonNumeric contextRef="From2022-02-162022-02-16_custom_Sec0.800NotesDue2040Member" name="dei:TradingSymbol">KO40B</ix:nonNumeric></span></td>
    <td style="padding-right: 5.4pt; padding-left: 5.4pt; text-align: center"><span id="xdx_90F_edei--SecurityExchangeName_c20220216__20220216__us-gaap--StatementClassOfStockAxis__custom--Sec0.800NotesDue2040Member_z8iVtPBb7ztc"><ix:nonNumeric contextRef="From2022-02-162022-02-16_custom_Sec0.800NotesDue2040Member" format="ixt-sec:exchnameen" name="dei:SecurityExchangeName">New York Stock Exchange</ix:nonNumeric></span></td></tr>
  <tr style="vertical-align: top">
    <td style="padding-right: 5.4pt; padding-left: 5.4pt; text-align: center"><span id="xdx_90F_edei--Security12bTitle_c20220216__20220216__us-gaap--StatementClassOfStockAxis__custom--Sec1.000NotesDue2041Member_z61MzjOdWGoi"><ix:nonNumeric contextRef="From2022-02-162022-02-16_custom_Sec1.000NotesDue2041Member" name="dei:Security12bTitle">1.000% Notes Due 2041</ix:nonNumeric></span></td>
    <td style="padding-right: 5.4pt; padding-left: 5.4pt; text-align: center"><span id="xdx_90E_edei--TradingSymbol_c20220216__20220216__us-gaap--StatementClassOfStockAxis__custom--Sec1.000NotesDue2041Member_zE0Sr0dvfIu7"><ix:nonNumeric contextRef="From2022-02-162022-02-16_custom_Sec1.000NotesDue2041Member" name="dei:TradingSymbol">KO41</ix:nonNumeric></span></td>
    <td style="padding-right: 5.4pt; padding-left: 5.4pt; text-align: center"><span id="xdx_90C_edei--SecurityExchangeName_c20220216__20220216__us-gaap--StatementClassOfStockAxis__custom--Sec1.000NotesDue2041Member_zw2AGQDqA2Wi"><ix:nonNumeric contextRef="From2022-02-162022-02-16_custom_Sec1.000NotesDue2041Member" format="ixt-sec:exchnameen" name="dei:SecurityExchangeName">New York Stock Exchange</ix:nonNumeric></span></td></tr>
  </table>
<p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0; text-align: justify"><span style="font-size: 10pt">&#160;</span></p>

<p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0; text-align: left"><span style="font-size: 10pt">Indicate
by check mark whether the Registrant is an emerging growth company as defined in Rule 405 of the Securities Act of 1933 (&#167;230.405
of this chapter) or Rule 12b-2 of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 (&#167;240.12b-2 of this chapter).</span></p>

<p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 10pt 0 0; text-align: justify"><span style="font-size: 10pt"></span></p>

<p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0; text-align: left">Emerging growth company&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;<span style="font: 10pt Wingdings"><span id="xdx_904_edei--EntityEmergingGrowthCompany_c20220216__20220216_zSsUve4bsS94"><ix:nonNumeric contextRef="From2022-02-16to2022-02-16" format="ixt:booleanfalse" name="dei:EntityEmergingGrowthCompany">o</ix:nonNumeric></span></span></p>




<p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0; text-align: justify"><span style="font-size: 10pt">&#160;</span></p>

<p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0; text-align: left"><span style="font-size: 10pt">If an emerging
growth company, indicate by check mark if the Registrant has elected not to use the extended transition period for complying with
any new or revised financial accounting standards provided pursuant to Section 13(a) of the Exchange Act. <span style="font-family: Wingdings">o</span></span></p>

<!-- Field: Rule-Page --><div style="text-align: left; margin-top: 3pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><div style="border-top: Black 1pt solid; font-size: 1pt; border-bottom: Black 4pt solid; width: 100%">&#160;</div></div><!-- Field: /Rule-Page -->


<!-- Field: Page; Sequence: 1 -->

    <div style="page-break-before: always; margin-top: 6pt; margin-bottom: 12pt"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; width: 100%"><tr><td style="text-align: center; width: 100%">&#160;</td></tr></table></div>
    <!-- Field: /Page -->



<p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0; text-indent: 0.5in"><span style="font-size: 10pt"></span></p>

<table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0; margin-bottom: 0; width: 100%"><tr style="vertical-align: top; text-align: justify">
<td style="width: 0%"></td><td style="width: 1in; text-align: left"><span style="font-size: 10pt"><b>Item 5.02.</b></span></td><td style="text-align: left"><span style="font-size: 10pt"><b>Departure of Directors or Certain Officers; Election of Directors; Appointment
of Certain Officers; Compensatory Arrangements of Certain Officers.</b></span></td>
</tr></table>

<p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0; text-indent: 0.5in"><span style="font-size: 10pt">&#160;</span></p>

<p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0; text-indent: 0.5in">On February 16, 2022, the Talent and Compensation Committee of the Board
of Directors (the Committee&#8221;) of The Coca-Cola Company (the &#8220;Company&#8221;) adopted amended form award agreements for performance
share units, stock options and restricted stock units (the &#8220;Award Agreements&#8221;) to be granted under The Coca-Cola Company 2014
Equity Plan, as amended (the &#8220;Equity Plan&#8221;). The Award Agreements were amended to reduce the exercise time at death to one
year for options, to allow vesting to continue if an individual transfers to an affiliate of the Company in certain situations, to remove
proration for certain involuntary termination events and to remove the service requirement for certain vesting provisions after age 60
for all termination events, in addition to immaterial administrative updates.</p>

<p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0; text-indent: 0.5in">&#160;</p>

<p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0; text-indent: 0.5in">In addition, on February 16, 2022, the Committee approved the 2022 performance
measures, weighting and metrics for executive officers under each of The Coca-Cola Company Performance Incentive Plan (the &#8220;Performance
Incentive Plan&#8221;) and The Coca-Cola Company Long-Term Incentive Plan (the &#8220;Long-Term Incentive Plan.&#8221;)</p>

<p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0; text-indent: 0.5in">&#160;</p>

<p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0; text-indent: 0.5in">With respect to the 2022 annual incentive award under the Performance Incentive
Plan, the Committee determined to include certain goals to promote employee diversity, equity and inclusion. The new goals will collectively comprise 10% of the executives&#8217; 2022 annual incentive under the Performance Incentive Plan, with
the prior year&#8217;s measures (Net Operating Revenue Growth and Operating Income Growth) equally comprising the remaining 90%.</p>

<p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0; text-indent: 0.5in">&#160;</p>

<p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0; text-indent: 0.5in">With respect to the 2022 long-term incentive award under the Long-Term
Incentive Program, the Committee determined to include certain measures to promote achievement of the Company&#8217;s environmental sustainability
priorities. The new measures will collectively comprise 10% of the executives&#8217; performance share unit award under the Long-Term
Incentive Program, with the prior year&#8217;s measures (Net Operating Revenue Growth, Earnings per Share Growth and Cumulative Free Cash
Flow) equally comprising the remaining 90%.</p>

<p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0; text-indent: 0.5in">&#160;</p>

<p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0; text-indent: 0.5in">The foregoing descriptions of the Award Agreements are qualified in their
entirety by reference to the Award Agreements, copies of which are attached hereto as Exhibits 10.1 through 10.3 and incorporated herein
by reference.</p>

<p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0; text-indent: 0.5in">&#160;</p>



<p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0; text-indent: 0"><span style="font-size: 10pt"></span></p>

<table cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" style="width: 100%">
  <tr style="vertical-align: top">
    <td style="font: 12pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; width: 1in"><span style="font-size: 10pt"><b>Item 9.01(d).</b></span></td>
    <td style="font: 12pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; text-align: justify"><span style="font-size: 10pt"><b>Financial Statements and Exhibits.</b></span></td></tr>
  </table>

     <TITLE STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif"></TITLE>

<BODY STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif">


<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0pt 10pt; text-align: right"><FONT STYLE="font-size: 10pt"><B>Exhibit
10.1</B></FONT></P>

<P STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 10pt; text-align: center"><FONT STYLE="font-size: 10pt">Award Notification
&ndash; Performance Share</FONT></P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0 0 10pt; text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-size: 10pt">Congratulations
[INSERT FULL NAME]! On [INSERT GRANT DATE], The Coca-Cola Company (the <FONT STYLE="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif"><B>Company</B></FONT>)
granted you an award (your <FONT STYLE="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif"><B>Award</B></FONT>) under The Coca-Cola Company
2014 Equity Plan, as amended from time to time (the <FONT STYLE="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif"><B>Plan</B></FONT>). Your
Award is a great opportunity to share in the long-term success of the Company and contribute to its future growth.</FONT></P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0 0 10pt; text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-size: 10pt">This document
provides details of the key terms of your Award. Your Award is subject to the formal rules of the Plan, plus the additional terms and
conditions (including country specific terms) as set out in a document called the &ldquo;Additional Terms&rdquo;. The Additional Terms
is available to review as part of the Award acceptance process. The Plan is available on your plan administrator website. This Award
Notification (including the appendices), the Plan and the Additional Terms together form your Award Agreement. You are being asked to
confirm that you understand and agree to be bound by these documents as part of the Award acceptance process, so we recommend you read
them carefully.</FONT></P>

<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; width: 100%; border-collapse: collapse">
  <TR STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; vertical-align: top; background-color: black">
    <TD COLSPAN="2" STYLE="border-right: Black 1pt solid; font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; padding-top: 6pt; padding-bottom: 6pt; padding-left: 0.1in; text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt; color: white"><B>Details
    of Award</B></FONT></TD></TR>
  <TR STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; vertical-align: top">
    <TD STYLE="padding: 0.05in 6pt 6pt 0.1in; border-right: black 1pt solid; border-bottom: black 1pt solid; border-left: white 1pt solid; font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; width: 19%; text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt"><B>Type
    of Award</B></FONT></TD>
    <TD STYLE="border-right: black 1pt solid; border-bottom: black 1pt solid; font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; padding: 0.05in 0.1in 6pt; width: 81%; text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt"><B>Performance
    Award (sometimes called Growth Share Units)] </B>-This is a conditional right to receive $0.25 par value common stock of the Company
    (<B>Stock</B>) in the future. You will not receive the Stock (or have any shareholder rights) unless your Award vests.</FONT></TD></TR>
  <TR STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; vertical-align: top">
    <TD STYLE="padding: 0.05in 6pt 6pt 0.1in; border-right: black 1pt solid; border-bottom: black 1pt solid; border-left: white 1pt solid; font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; text-align: left"><FONT STYLE="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt"><B>Target
    number of shares of Stock subject to your Award</B></FONT></TD>
    <TD STYLE="border-right: black 1pt solid; border-bottom: black 1pt solid; font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; padding: 0.05in 0.1in 6pt; text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">[INSERT]
    </FONT></TD></TR>
  <TR STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; vertical-align: top">
    <TD STYLE="padding: 0.05in 6pt 6pt 0.1in; border-right: black 1pt solid; border-bottom: black 1pt solid; border-left: white 1pt solid; font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt"><B>Continuing
    employment</B></FONT></TD>
    <TD STYLE="border-right: black 1pt solid; border-bottom: black 1pt solid; font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; padding: 0.05in 0.1in 6pt; text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">Your
    Award is subject to your continuing employment, as set out in the Employment Events Appendix to this document and the Plan.</FONT></TD></TR>
  <TR STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; vertical-align: top">
    <TD STYLE="padding: 0.05in 6pt 6pt 0.1in; border-right: black 1pt solid; border-bottom: black 1pt solid; border-left: white 1pt solid; font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt"><B>Performance
    conditions</B></FONT></TD>
    <TD STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; padding: 0.05in 0.1in; border-right: black 1pt solid; border-bottom: black 1pt solid"><P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0; text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-size: 10pt">Performance
    conditions apply to your Award, which are set out in the Performance Criteria Appendix to this document. The performance conditions
    must be met in order for your Award to vest.</FONT></P>
    <P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0 0 0 0.1in; text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-size: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P></TD></TR>
  <TR STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; vertical-align: top">
    <TD STYLE="padding: 0.05in 6pt 6pt 0.1in; border-right: black 1pt solid; border-bottom: black 1pt solid; border-left: white 1pt solid; font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt"><B>Performance
    period</B></FONT></TD>
    <TD STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; padding: 0.05in 0.1in; border-right: black 1pt solid; border-bottom: black 1pt solid"><P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0 0 6pt; text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-size: 10pt">[INSERT]</FONT></P>
    <P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0 0 6pt; text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-size: 10pt">The performance
    conditions are measured during this period. See the Performance Criteria Appendix for more details.</FONT></P></TD></TR>
  <TR STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; vertical-align: top">
    <TD STYLE="padding: 0.05in 6pt 6pt 0.1in; border-right: black 1pt solid; border-bottom: black 1pt solid; border-left: white 1pt solid; font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; text-align: left"><FONT STYLE="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt"><B>Date
    your Award normally vests</B></FONT></TD>
    <TD STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; padding: 0.05in 0.1in; border-right: black 1pt solid; border-bottom: black 1pt solid"><P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0 0 6pt; text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-size: 10pt">[INSERT DATE],
    or if later when the performance conditions are certified.</FONT></P>
    <P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0 0 6pt; text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-size: 10pt">When your
    Award vests, you become entitled to the Stock subject to your Award. You do not need to purchase that Stock - it is delivered automatically
    to you.</FONT></P>
    <P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0 0 6pt; text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-size: 10pt">The number
    of shares of Stock that vest will be calculated based upon the target number of shares of Stock set forth above and the provisions
    of the Performance Criteria Appendix.</FONT></P>
    <P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0 0 6pt; text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-size: 10pt">The number
    of shares of Stock that vest will normally be delivered to you as soon as administratively possible following vesting, unless a different
    timing for delivering the Stock applies under the Employment Events Appendix.</FONT></P>
    <P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0 0 6pt; text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-size: 10pt">Your Award
    will generally be settled in Shares, except where the Employment Events Appendix applies and specifies otherwise.</FONT></P>
    <P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0 0 6pt; text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-size: 10pt">You are liable
    for any tax, fees and costs due on vesting, which may be withheld.</FONT></P>
    <P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0 0 6pt; text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt"><B>Remember</B></FONT><FONT STYLE="font-size: 10pt">:
    your Award will only vest if and to the extent that all of the terms and conditions of your Award are satisfied. To the extent that
    your Award does not vest, it will be forfeited.</FONT></P></TD></TR>
</TABLE>
